ValidationRule.description: Other fields are required if check type is Misc Check
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Check_Type__c,'Misc Check'),OR(ISBLANK( Check_Amount__c ),ISBLANK( Check_Payable_To__c ),ISBLANK(TEXT( Address__c ))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Check Type is Misc Check, Check Amount, Check Payable To and Address are required
